Conjuration 4

Send Vodyanoy

EA Rus,  MA Vanarus,  LA Bogarus

Remote Summon Stealthy Commander:#1953 Vodyanoy
Destination Terrain : Sea
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster summons and sends a Vodyanoy to a distant sea province. This ritual can be cast on land. The Vodyanoy is a water spirit that resembles a man with the lower parts of a fish. It is covered in black fish-scales, algae and mud. Vodyanoy generally dislike humans and can only be coerced into servitude with the aid of magic. They are powerful users of Water magic, but cannot leave the water.
